name: There's Danger in the Darkness
description:
Try to survive for as long as you can and get the highest score, picking up powerups to help you and balancing your weapon and your light source. Hopefully you enjoy the game: this is my first finished game and the first game jam I've joined.

EPILEPSY WARNING: contains flashing 

Controls: Esc to pause, Left click to shoot, R to reload, E to pick up items, Mouse wheel scroll/numbers to change weapon, and move mouse to look around.

All art and coding is by me.

Music/Ambiance by DHSFX.

Most sound effects from Pixabay.
